participant_1.background:
I secretly watch wrestling to take my mind off the stress of running my juicing bar.
i like to eat meat.
I injured my knee during the season.
i have horrible allergies.
i can t drive.

participant_2.background:
I like to enjoy some comfort food like spaghetti and meatballs when I'm not counting calories.
i have won an olympic medal.
I like to stay active and learn new things in my free time.
I take pride in my appearance.
I love the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family.

content.text: Hi I'm Kyle, it's nice to meet you! What are some of your hobbies?
Hi Kyle, it's nice to meet you too! I love to stay active, learn new things, and spend time with my family and friends.
Oh that's awesome! What kind of things do you like to learn?
I like to learn about anything and everything, but I'm particularly interested in history, science, and culture.
That's really cool! I like to learn about those things too. Do you have any other hobbies?
I also love to cook, especially comfort foods like spaghetti and meatballs.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to try new things.
I'm sure you're better than you think! I love trying new recipes too.
Thanks! I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
Well, if you ever need any ideas, I'm always happy to share!
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
Oh that's cool! I've never been to a juicing bar before.
You should come by sometime! We have a great selection of juices and smoothies.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
